column5: Not sure if this is the right spot or not, but I thought I'd let everybody know about it. Great fun for the whole family.  www.orillia.com  Perch festival is down the left hand side.
I'll be there, I've never missed it. Already got the rooms booked at the Hywayman So far 21st & 22nd 26th & 27th, 30th & 1st and more. Great place to take the kids  like myself  .
Be there as well. First time going. Be there April 20, and May 3rd for sure. Other days to follow, depends on other commitments. My daughter is so excited to go!
Watch for the OFC flag on my boat
I am hoping to get out to that.  Also, I am supposed to be re-designing the Perch Festival website. Trying to get that organized right now! Might not be until next years site though.

I had fun at last year with Lexx and his first mate:    If anyones going that wants some help with the crazy gas prices or just someone to back up their 4 lb perch stories just let me know (blatent I don't own a boat plug)
Always welcome aboard my Boat Sean  I will pm you once I get a better idea when too head up
